oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A plan of the town and fort of Carillon at Ticonderoga; with the attack made by the British army commanded by Genl. Abercrombie 8 July 1758 / engraved by Thos. Jefferys, Geographer to his royal highness the Prince of Wales.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jefferys, Thomas, -1771.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps shelf.; Ticonderoga (N.Y.)--Maps.; Fort Ticonderoga (N.Y.)--Maps.; Ticonderoga, Battle of, 1758--Maps.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows encampments of French troops and direction of British attacks.; Color is applied to military units only.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: William L. Clements Library Image Bank
